sources.title: The Long Hair Of Death
sources.description: Set in a feudal village in the 15th century a woman is accused as a witch and put to death but her daughter believes it was really because the local lord sexually desired her. She confronts the lord and is killed. Another daughter is spared and marries the lord's son. The older sister reappears to avenge the mother's death.

metadata.Plot: In a 15th-century feudal village, a woman is accused of witchcraft and put to death. Her beautiful older daughter knows the real reason for the execution lies in the lord's sexual desire for her mother. After confronting the lord on the matter, she, too, is killed. A much younger daughter is spared and taken in by her mother's killers. Once she is of age, as a horrible, deadly plague sweeps the land, she marries the lord's worthless son. Then, during a brutal thunderstorm, the older daughter mysteriously reappears and begins to avenge her mother's death.
metadata.Writer: Ernesto Gastaldi, Tonino Valerii, Antonio Margheriti
metadata.Actors: Barbara Steele, George Ardisson, Halina Zalewska
